Title: Diversifies the investment authority of the New York state insurance fund
Summary: Diversifies the investment authority of the New York state insurance fund.
LawCode: Amd §87, Work Comp L; amd §§1108 & 1410, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law and the insurance law, in relation to diversifying the New York state insurance fund's investment authority
